name: Riso Investments LLC
overview:
Founded in 2001, Riso Investments LLC is a Delaware based Limited Liability Company. Our focus includes alternative investments within the areas of seed funding, venture capital, leveraged buyouts, real estate and mezzanine capital. By partnering with the best firms and managers, Riso Investments LLC seeks outperformance in these asset classes while mitigating risk by enabling a vintage year fund of funds strategy.

The new Discovery Fund seeks earlier stage investments in the innovative companies. This fund seeks the most disruptive ideas and business models primarily within internet technology. The Discovery Fund focuses on seed and angel rounds of funding.
